assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare that they have no competing interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Approval for biobanked DNA sequencing was granted by KU Leuven/University Hospital Leuven Commission for Medical Ethics S59307. Animal procedures were approved by the ethical committee and performed according to the guidelines of the Animal Welfare Committee of KU Leuven, Belgium (P248/2015).

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Informed consent was provided to the couple before whole exome sequencing.
